appetizers.name: Wonton Bonton
appetizers.description: A dough droplet with cream cheese on the interior which is deep fried.

appetizers.name: Onion Ringlets
appetizers.description: Rings of onions breaded and deep fried in vegetable oil.

appetizers.name: Bread Saber
appetizers.description: Sticks of bread dough which are slathered with chopped garlic, various Italian spices, and butter prior to cooking in an oven and promptly set on fire like a light saber.

coldSandwiches.name: The Terminator
coldSandwiches.description: Our classic Italian sandwich with a JSON twist.

coldSandwiches.name: Elf Island
coldSandwiches.description: A cold strawberry-infused sandwich even the elves themselves would jump for joy over.

hotSandwiches.name: Reuben Reuben
hotSandwiches.description: Corned beef and swiss cheese meet their maker in the oven with a glorious Big Mac sauce finisher.

hotSandwiches.name: Taco El Encante
hotSandwiches.description: A grilled taco so fresh and savory you truly won't believe it.

desserts.name: Midnight
desserts.description: Betty Crocker's Traditional Brownie Mix but with just enough extra steps for us to be able to call it our own.

desserts.name: Plump King Pie
desserts.description: A pumpkin pie for a plump king.

drinks.name: White Mystery
drinks.description: It tastes like the 'White Mystery' Airheads flavor, just slightly worse.

drinks.name: Lemonaid
drinks.description: A hit among students -- just one glass and you're sure to ace your next test.
